sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { EventGoalCard } from '../../Footer/EventGoalCard.js'; import { ChevronDown, User, Users, UserPlus, UserMinus, ArrowRight, ArrowRightCircle, ArrowLeftCircle, MessageSquare, TrendingUp, TrendingDown } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Roleplay = (props) => { let cardStyle = { width:"70px", height:"50px", fontSize:"2px", } //state to keep track of if we are showing game rules or game setup const [showRules, setshowRules] = useState(true); const toggleSteps = ()=> { setshowRules(!showRules); } return (

Game {(!showRules) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}

Show Game {(showRules) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}

Step 1

Decide the 6 players who will be Members of the House. The rest will be playing as Commentators.

If you don't have enough players, each Member also plays as a Commentator.

Step 2 - Members

Players are assigned a random Member Card, a Goal Card, and receive two Signal Tokens.

Your goal is to complete your Goal Card or find love and leave the house.

Step 2 - Commentators

Players are assigned a random Commentator Card and receive a Signal Token.

Your goal is to commentate on what the Members are doing and crack jokes.

Step 1 - Introductions Round

All new Members introduce themselves.

All Members secretly point their Signal Tokens towards a Member who they like (may be as a friend) or hate. You can point at yourself.

Step 2 - Commentary Round

Commentators commentate on what they saw.

All Commentators use their Signal Tokens to predict which Member likes (or hates) who.

Step 3 - Event Round (Liked)

The Member with the most amount of predicted "likes" from Commentators is now trending on social media!

This Member draws an Event Card and chooses who gets to participate. They may include themselves.

The chosen Members act out the Event.

Step 4 - Event Round (Hated)

The Member with the most amount of predicted "hates" from Commentators is now trending on social media!

This Member draws an Event Card and chooses who gets to participate. They may include themselves.

The chosen Members act out the Event.

Go to Game {(showRules) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}
); } export default Roleplay;
